snippet.title: Permafrost - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
See building elements, exploration, hunting, and more in this gameplay trailer for Permafrost. In Permafrost, explore a bleak, open-world urban landscape where survival is not just a choice—it's a necessity.

In the wake of the cataclysmic 'shattering', an apocalyptic moon phase phenomenon, humanity is teetering on the brink of extinction as the world succumbs to an eternal deep freeze. The game reveals the collapse of existing political and economic structures and the deadly winter cold that has resulted in the deaths of billions of people.
